genshin:HydroPower.NAME: Hydro
DESCRIPTIONS: [#0000FF]Hydro [#FF0000]Pyro :Deals elemental stacks consumed * 2 damage. NL [#0000FF]Hydro [#BFEFFF]Cryo :Apply elemental stacks consumed #yWeak. NL [#0000FF]Hydro [#912CEE]Electro :Deals elemental stacks consumed damage to ALL enemies. NL [#0000FF]Hydro [#32CD32]Dentro :Spawns #yDendrogranum that consumes stacks.

genshin:PyroPower.NAME: Pyro
DESCRIPTIONS: [#FF0000]Pyro [#0000FF]Hydro :Deals elemental stacks consumed * 2 damage. NL [#FF0000]Pyro [#BFEFFF]Cryo :Deals elemental stacks consumed * 2 damage. NL [#FF0000]Pyro [#912CEE]Electro :Deals elemental stacks consumed * 2 damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a #yBurn into your discard pile. NL [#FF0000]Pyro [#32CD32]Dentro :Gain elemental stacks consumed #yStrength. NL At the end of this turn, lose elemental stacks consumed #yStrength.

genshin:ElectroPower.NAME: Electro
DESCRIPTIONS: [#912CEE]Electro [#0000FF]Hydro :Deals elemental stacks consumed damage to ALL enemies. NL [#912CEE]Electro [#FF0000]Pyro :Deals elemental stacks consumed * 2 damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a #yBurn into your discard pile. NL [#912CEE]Electro [#BFEFFF]Cyro :Apply elemental stacks consumed #yVulnerable. NL [#912CEE]Electro [#32CD32]Dentro :Your next Attack deals elemental stacks consumed #yadditional damage,next Block gain elemental stacks consumed #yadditional block

genshin:CryoPower.NAME: Cryo
DESCRIPTIONS: [#BFEFFF]Cryo [#0000FF]Hydro :Apply elemental stacks consumed #yWeak. NL [#BFEFFF]Cryo [#FF0000]Pyro :Deals elemental stacks consumed * 2 damage. NL [#BFEFFF]Cryo Electro :Apply elemental stacks consumed #yVulnerable. NL [#BFEFFF]Cryo [#32CD32]Dentro :enemies lose elemental stacks consumed #yStrength this turn.

genshin:DentroPower.NAME: Dentro
DESCRIPTIONS: [#32CD32]Dentro [#0000FF]Hydro :Spawns #yDendrogranum that consumes stacks. NL [#32CD32]Dentro [#FF0000]Pyro :Gain elemental stacks consumed #yStrength. NL At the end of this turn, lose elemental stacks consumed #yStrength. NL [#32CD32]Dentro [#BFEFFF]Cryo :enemies lose elemental stacks consumed #yStrength this turn. NL [#32CD32]Dentro [#912CEE]Electro :Your next Attack deals elemental stacks consumed #yadditional damage,next Block gain elemental stacks consumed #yadditional block

genshin:ElementalMasteryPower.NAME: ElementalMastery
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases the effect of applied elements.
Decreases the effect of applied elements.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #bX ElementalMastery.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, add a *WildStar into your hand.

genshin:BreastplatePower.NAME: Breastplate

genshin:NextTurnDoubleElementPower.NAME: Double Element
